question:
some people think that the most important thing about being rich is it gives a person 
the opportunity to help other people.

do you agree or disagree?
text: Being rich in the society is not only the pride thing but it also opens the door to help others. Some people think that the most important thing about being rich is; it gives them a chance to help people who are in need. This essay will argue why money is moderately necessary to support in a large scale.

Money is not only the requirement to help others because helping others can be in any form. It can be in the form of providing free education, giving shelter to the homeless. For an  instance, when I studied in Australia for one year where we had the task of supporting  people who are mentally broke so, we helped them by motivating and showing them the path of success. In an other instance, my aunt who is a teacher by profession where she supports underprivileged children by teaching them with no tuition fee. Therefore, being rich is not necessary in this kind of scenarios.

On the other hand, some people think that the most important  thing of having more money gives a person the opportunity to help others. Being rich is sometimes necessary for those who wants to help because it provides a chance to support more number of people. For example, my brother who is an entrepreneur earns million dollars a year so, he runs a school for 500 students which provides everything for free. Instead of paying hefty taxes to the government they can do these activities.
This essay argued that why being rich is moderately necessarly to help people. In my opinion, instead of paying high taxes by billionaires to the government one can help directly to the people.

error_list.error: any of various alternatives; some other
